code: import{Fragment,useState}from"react";import React from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import Loader from'../../Loader/Loader';import WelcomePhase from'./phases/welcome-phase';import PasswordPhase from'./phases/password-phase';import CodePhase from'./phases/code-phase';import EmailPhase from'./phases/email-phase';import'./SignInUp.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SignIn=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[inputCode,setInputCode]=useState("");const[emailCode,setEmailCode]=useState(0);const[phase,setPhase]=useState(0);const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[name,setName]=useState("");const[showLoader,setShowLoader]=useState(false);const comps=[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EmailPhase,{phase:phase,setPhase:setPhase,email:email,setEmail:setEmail,setEmailCode:setEmailCode,setShowLoader:setShowLoader}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CodePhase,{phase:phase,setPhase:setPhase,code:inputCode,setCode:setInputCode,emailCode:emailCode,email:email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PasswordPhase,{phase:phase,setPhase:setPhase,password:password,setPassword:setPassword,name:name,setName:setName,email:email,emailCode:emailCode}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WelcomePhase,{phase:phase,setPhase:setPhase})];const navigate=useNavigate();const movePhaseBack=()=>{const prevPhase=phase-1;if(prevPhase>=0){setPhase(prevPhase);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"page-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sighnInUp-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"go-back-button",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"back-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:movePhaseBack,className:"back-button",children:"\u041D\u0430\u0437\u0430\u0434"})]}),phase<=3?comps[phase]:navigate('/')]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loader,{showLoader:showLoader,setShowLoader:setShowLoader})]});};export default SignIn;
